issue.title: [CF 65] Crowd Control Preset
issue.body:
I've been using the following additional debuff preset, I've found it extremely useful in the new heroics where crowd control is much more valued. It has all the crowd controls I could think of and then some.

["CrowdControl"] = "339;2637;33786;118;61305;28272;61721;61780;28271;1499;60192;19503;19386;20066;10326;9484;6770;2094;51514;76780;710;5782;6358",


> Posted by CurseForge user calico0 | Imported from CurseForge issue #65 | Raw
